name: Abomination
desc: "Foolish rabble! You are beneath me!"

name: Absorbing Man
desc: On Reveal: If the last card you played has an On Reveal, copy its text. (if it's in play)

name: Adam Warlock
desc: At the end of each turn, if you are winning this location, draw a card.

name: Aero
desc: On Reveal: Move the last enemy card played this turn to this location.

name: Agatha Harkness
desc: Agatha starts in your hand and plays your cards for you.

name: Agent 13
desc: On Reveal: Add a random card to your hand.

name: Agent Coulson
desc: On Reveal: Add a random 4-Cost and 5-Cost card to your hand.

name: Alioth
desc: Never gonna give you up.

name: America Chavez
desc: Starts on the bottom of your deck. Draw this on turn 6.

name: Angel
desc: When one of your cards is destroyed, this flies out of your deck to replace it.

name: Angela
desc: After you play a card here, +2 Power.

name: Annihilus
desc: On Reveal: Each of your cards randomly chooses a location to move to.

name: Ant Man
desc: Ongoing: If you have 3 other cards here, +3 Power.

name: Apocalypse
desc: When you discard this from your hand, put it back with +4 Power.

name: Armor
desc: Ongoing: Cards at this location can't be destroyed.

name: Arnim Zola
desc: On Reveal: Destroy a random friendly card here. Add copies of it to the other locations.

name: Attuma
desc: If you have another card here at the end of your turn, destroy this.

name: Baron Mordo
desc: On Reveal: Your opponent draws a card. Set its Cost to 6.

name: Bast
desc: On Reveal: Set the Power of all cards in your hand to 3.

name: Beast
desc: On Reveal: Return your other cards at this location to your hand. They cost 1 less.

name: Bishop
desc: After you play a card, this gains +1 Power.

name: Black Bolt
desc: On Reveal: Your opponent must discard the lowest-Cost card in their hand.

name: Black Cat
desc: If this is in your hand at the end of your turn, discard it.

name: Black Knight
desc: When this is destroyed, draw a card.

name: Black Panther
desc: On Reveal: Double this card's Power.

name: Black Widow
desc: On Reveal: Add a Widow's Bite to your opponent's hand.

name: Blade
desc: On Reveal: Discard a card from your hand.

name: Blink
desc: You can move this each turn. When it moves, +1 Power.

name: Blob
desc: Ongoing: Nothing can move this to another location.

name: Blue Marvel
desc: Ongoing: Your other cards have +1 Power.

name: Brood
desc: On Reveal: Add 2 Broodlings to this location with the same Power.

name: Bucky Barnes
desc: When this is destroyed, create the Winter Soldier in its place.

name: Bullseye
desc: On Reveal: The next card you draw will be a 2-Cost card. (if any are left)

name: Cable
desc: On Reveal: Put the bottom card of your opponent's deck into your hand.

name: Captain America
desc: Ongoing: Your other cards at this location have +1 Power.

name: Captain Marvel
desc: At the end of the game, move to a location that wins you the game. (If possible)

name: Carnage
desc: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards here. +2 Power for each destroyed.

name: Cerebro
desc: Ongoing: Your highest Power cards get +2 Power.

name: Cloak
desc: On Reveal: Next turn, both players can move cards to this location.

name: Colleen Wing
desc: On Reveal: Discard the lowest-cost card from your hand.

name: Colossus
desc: Ongoing: Can't be destroyed, moved, or have its Power reduced.

name: Cosmo
desc: Ongoing: On Reveal abilities won't happen at this location.

name: Crossbones
desc: You can only play this at locations where you are winning.

name: Crystal
desc: On Reveal: Each player draws a card.

name: Cyclops
desc: "Let's move, X-Men."

name: Daredevil

name: Darkhawk
desc: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card in your opponent's deck.

name: Dazzler
desc: Ongoing: +2 Power for each location that's full on your side.

name: Deadpool
desc: When this is destroyed, return it to your hand with double the Power.

name: Death
desc: Costs 1 less for each card destroyed this game.

desc: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards at this location.

desc: On Reveal: Add a Rock to each other location, for both players.

name: Destroyer

name: Doctor Doom
desc: On Reveal: Add a 4-Power DoomBot to each other location.

name: Doctor Strange
desc: On Reveal: Move your highest Power cards to this location.

name: Domino

name: Dracula

name: Drax
